outputs.output_descr:
1. Legal Aid system strengthened through an improved legal aid law, legal awareness and effective legal aid services. 
2. Increased access to information for public concerning   transitional justice in cooperation  with relevant agencies & CSOs 
3. Increased access of community's (especially women , young girls and  minorities to Ombudsmen Institution (OI) at regional level through increased complaint registration and ability to resolve cases.
4. Improved access to mediation services especially by vulnerable groups through an effective mediation system.
5. Municipal level legal/justice duty bearers & stakeholders strengthened - to advance gender justice in selected municipalities.

project_descr: To assure Access to Justice for all people seeking legal remedy in conformity with constitutional and human rights standards in one of the pillars of a functional judicial systems and society in general.
